content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: dark_oak_stairs
inventory=[{"type": "flower_banner_pattern", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 6, "index": 17}, {"type": "blue_ice", "quantity": 60, "index": 20}, {"type": "oak_fence_gate", "quantity": 1, "index": 24}, {"type": "bedrock", "quantity": 37, "index": 25}, {"type": "mutton", "quantity": 64, "index": 27}, {"type": "damaged_anvil", "quantity": 54, "index": 35}, {"type": "witch_spawn_egg", "quantity": 2, "index": 38}, {"type": "mooshroom_spawn_egg", "quantity": 7, "index": 40}]
thought: To craft the dark_oak_stairs, I need to move the dark_oak_planks to the crafting grid. I will move the first dark_oak_planks from slot 17 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 17 to slot 1 with quantity 1
